paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant V208G, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: All 11 sites annotated BRCA2 V208G as a germline variant of uncertain significance (VUS). Considering the familial history of breast cancers, two EPs (Sites D and H) recommended genetic counseling.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS) with no specific functional data provided.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was discussed in the context of familial breast cancer history.
key_quotes: All 11 sites annotated BRCA2 V208G as a germline variant of uncertain significance (VUS).
Considering the familial history of breast cancers, two EPs (Sites D and H) recommended genetic counseling.

tables_processed.table_caption: Clinical information and the CGP results of simulated cases

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the context of the simulated cases.
